profile.description: Full-Stack Web Developer with Passion for Design and Programming. Creativity, Innovation, and a Love of Learning.
profile.description1: I am a full-stack web developer with a deep understanding and experience in design and programming. I am passionate about creating websites and web applications that are attractive, functional, and innovative. In my projects, I have demonstrated my ability to: Develop attractive and user-friendly web interfaces. Implement complex and dynamic features. Build scalable and secure web applications. I am always looking for new ways to learn and grow as a developer. I am a motivated and results-oriented individual with a strong work ethic. I am also a team player and I am always willing to help others. I am confident that I have the skills and experience necessary to be a valuable asset to any team. I am eager to learn more about your company and the opportunities that you have available.

experience.description: Looking for my first career opportunity in the web sector, both for internships and employment.I am a young web developer with a passion for the craft. I consider myself a versatile and adaptable professional, with experience in both individual and group student projects.In my projects, I have developed complete, dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly webs and apps, with easy usability. I have worked with a variety of technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular, Java, and MySQL.I am passionate about learning and growing professionally, and I am always willing to contribute my knowledge and skills to any team.
experience.employment: Seeking my first career opportunity in the web sector, both for internships and employment. I am a young web developer with a passion for the craft. I consider myself a versatile and adaptable professional, with experience in both individual and group student projects.

hobbies1.title: Riding my Trik-Azub
hobbies1.description: Going for rides on the beach and in the mountains

hobbies2.title: Walking my dog
hobbies2.description: I go for walks with my dog every day for at least half an hour

hobbies3.title: Swimming
hobbies3.description: I go swimming 3 times a week, it's great for my body and mind

projectAngular.title: EkoTokio
projectAngular.description: E-commerce of produce from garden to table. Web of food products direct from the farmer to the table of each home without intermediaries. In it, the user can see the products, create a user, log in... Applied Spring Security and mysql database. Responsive on all screen formats. Teamwork of 4 people

projectJava1.title: TallerFundAdecco
projectJava1.description: Api for a mechanic workshop where the customer has their file and can book an appointment for their repair, modify their data, request a quote, choose a professional and workshop in the network. With mysql database. Responsive in all screen formats

projectJavaSpring.title: Filmo Tokio
projectJavaSpring.description: Final api of a film library course where a user can create a movie, rate it, make a critique, log in, log out. The user can only rate once per movie. It has two roles and depending on whether you are admin or user you can access more or less domain of the app. Uses mysql database, Has two integrated modules (Api-Rest and Batch Process). Responsive in all screen formats

projectJava.title: Lord of the Rings
projectJava.description: Final project of a Java course where I recreate a game of battles between armies (heroes and beasts) where each member fights another opponent and the side that remains alive wins. In each turn, two dice are thrown and through the result, more or less life is subtracted from the opponent.

construction.title: Construction Tokio
construction.description: Informational website for a construction company. Final project of the web development course. User-friendly, intuitive, with cookie notice

css.title: Css website
css.description: A website that showcases my CSS skills, including sliders, grids, layouts, form submission, and responsiveness.

web_personal.title: website personal
web_personal.description: A website that demonstrates my HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills, and that is fully responsive and user-interactive
